name: A. XORinacci
statement:
Cengiz recently learned Fibonacci numbers and now he is studying
different algorithms to find them. After getting bored of reading them,
he came with his own new type of numbers that he named numbers. He
defined them as follows: f(0) = a; f(1) = b; f(n) = f(n-1)
oplus f(n-2) when n > 1, where
oplus denotes the bitwise XOR operation. You are given three integers a,
b, and n, calculate f(n).You have to answer for T independent test
cases.
